title: BRIEF-Reliance Nippon Life Asset Management Says Nippon Life Insurance Completes Acquisition Of 75% Stake In Co
text:
BRIEF-Reliance Nippon Life Asset Management Says Nippon Life Insurance Completes Acquisition Of 75% Stake In Co

Stock Markets 51 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 20:01)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Reliance Nippon Life Asset Management Says Nippon Life Insurance Completes Acquisition Of 75% Stake In Co Sept 27 (Reuters) - Reliance Nippon Life Asset Management Ltd : * NIPPON LIFE INSURANCE CO OF JAPAN COMPLETES ACQUISITION OF 75% STAKE IN CO
